title: CAT EYE in BLACK
content: Les.Basics black cat eye sunglasses is made of acetate. Affordable aesthetic sunglasses that don't provide high maximum protection.

title: KNIT SKIRT in CREAM
content: At Les.Basics versatility and timelessness are always our top priority when designing our pieces.

title: MULTIWAY DRESS in DARK GREEN
content: The Multiway Dress is a basic statement in your wardrobe.

title: BASIC SOCKS in WHITE
content: Les.Basics unisex white socks are made from a lightweight cotton-blend and feature a black les.basics logo in front.

title: OVERSIZED SHIRT in WHITE
content: Les.Basics white long sleeve button-down shirt is made of cotton poplin with a relaxed oversized fit.

title: STRAIGHT LEG BASIC JEANS in MEDIUM BLUE
content: Our new signature straight leg jeans. This fit is a timeless and versatile staple to add to your wardrobe.
